name: MiGoals Premium
shortDescription: Bank smarter with this full package deal that offers daily banking convenience, flexible credit solutions and great lifestyle benefits.
salesHighlights: Free credit card and overdraft included in monthly service fee (Credit card and overdraft is for clients 18 years and older and dependant on credit eligibility)
Up to 12 domestic airport lounge visits per year
Over 1% cashback on spend on your Nedbank Amex Debit Card (accepted at all major groceries, pharmacy, travel and homeware stores)
Free R5 000 cash withdrawals & R5 000 cash deposits at Nedbank ATMs (per month)
Free debit orders, electronic payments, transfers & stop orders
25 cents cash back per litre at bp (all fuel)
50% off at selected Nu Metro cinemas (unlimited tickets)
R60 pm off monthly fee for spouse

applicationSteps.name: Authenticate
applicationSteps.Description: Let's begin by confirming your identity.

applicationSteps.name: Choose extras
applicationSteps.Description: Select optional extras for your account.

applicationSteps.name: About you
applicationSteps.Description: We need personal details and other information to open this account.

applicationSteps.name: Customise
applicationSteps.Description: Choose your preferences, including card delivery and staying in touch.

applicationSteps.name: Finishing up
applicationSteps.Description: Finish the paperwork and activate your product.

productFeatures.name: Nedbankatmwithdrawals
productFeatures.description: R5000,00 Free withdrawals at Nedbank ATMS

productFeatures.name: AirtimewithoutAirtime
productFeatures.description: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*001#)

productFeatures.name: SendiMali
productFeatures.description: Send i-Mali (Send money to a cellphone number using *120*001#)

eligibilityRules.description: You need to be 55 years or older
